title: Kissing the Coronavirus
description: She was supposed to cure the Coronavirus. Instead... she fell in love with it.Dr. Alexa Ashingtonford is a part of a crack team of scientists tasked with finding the cure to the devastating Coronavirus. Little did she know she would end up falling in love with it, in this steamy viral-erotica.Kissing the Coronavirus is a steamy tale about forbidden love and dark desires come to life.
author: M.J.    Edwards
